text:
heads up, not sure if this channel is intended to be a private beta channel - but it’s public(that’s how I snuck in)

anyhow question: *Is this functionality public for all enterprise users right now or is it in beta still?*

Got a client that hopefully we can convince to migrate to this from a custom login system we made.

One more question I have atleast 1 client that has a need for a system like this, but based on the docs one aspect of what they need doesn’t appear to be possible currently.

This particular client has pages on HS that are specific to each individual customer, and each customer can view their own page but should not be able to view another customers page.

Since it seems this functionality is based on a HubSpot List, is this sort of thing possible without say creating a new list for each individual client?
Hi <@U7SL518D6> right now it's only lists based but we do hope to add the ability to restrict at an individual contact level at some point.  No ETA available on that yet, I'm afraid.
